Saint-Saëns Centenary Concert

Monday 8 November 2021 - 1:00pm

In commemoration of the 100th anniversary of his death, we perform a programme of works by Camille Saint-Saens.

United Reformed Church, Witham

90 Newland Street
Witham CM8 1AH
United Kingdom

Programme:

  1. Havanaise op.83
  2. Romance op.36
  3. Allegro Appassionato op. 43
  4. Trio no. 1 in F major, op.18
